name: Rock Paper Scissors (mikesaladino)
description:
2D 3 player fighting game based on the mechanics of Rock Paper Scissors. Beat your strength while avoiding your weakness . Rock damages Scissors, Scissors damages Paper, Paper damages Rock. When one health reaches zero. The player that damages them wins

Game uses WASD, Up Down Left Right, IJKL

A project made in my Game-a-Week class at LIU Post. 

Prompt: Genre you hate.  A play on JRPGs
